story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful mountains of Tajikistan, there lived a young girl named Leyla. Leyla had long flowing black hair that shimmered in the sunlight, and bright, curious eyes that sparkled like the stars in the night sky.

Leyla loved to explore the mountains, chasing after butterflies and listening to the gentle whispers of the wind. But her favorite time of day was always bedtime, when her grandmother would tell her magical stories under the light of the full moon.

One evening, as the stars twinkled above, Leyla's grandmother began to tell her a special tale of a kind-hearted butterfly named Sitora. Sitora was the most graceful and beautiful butterfly in all the land, with wings that glimmered like the morning dew.

Sitora spent her days fluttering from flower to flower, spreading joy and happiness wherever she went. One day, she came across a lonely caterpillar who dreamt of flying high in the sky like Sitora. With a gentle touch of her wings, Sitora transformed the caterpillar into a magnificent butterfly, teaching him to believe in his own magic.

As Leyla listened intently to her grandmother's tale, she felt the warmth of love and kindness filling her heart. And as she drifted off to sleep, she dreamed of soaring through the mountains with Sitora by her side, spreading love and light wherever they went.

And so, under the watchful gaze of the moon and the stars, Leyla fell into a peaceful slumber, knowing that the magic of bedtime stories would always keep her safe and warm.

The end. Goodnight, sweet Leyla. May your dreams be filled with wonder and delight.
